required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Use Of Three Commercial Preparations Of Injectable Hyaluronic Acid In Hands Rejuvenation
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Trial On The Use Of Three Commercial Preparations Of Injectable Hyaluronic Acid (Emervel® Volume Lidocaine, Emervel® Deep Lidocaine And Emervel® Touch) In Hands Rejuvenation

lead_sponsor.agency: Brazilan Center for Studies in Dermatology

clinical_study.source: Brazilan Center for Studies in Dermatology

brief_summary.textblock: Assessment of efficacy of hyaluronic acid - Emervel® Volume Lidocaine combined or not with Emervel® Touch and Emervel® Deep Lidocaine combined or not with Emervel® Touch in female patients with loss of fatty tissue in hands.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a single center, phase IV, randomized, investigator-blind study of three different hyaluronic dermal filler injections for volume enhancing in the dorsum of the hands. As an investigator-blind study, only the investigators are unaware of which dermal fillers were injected in the dorsum of each hand.

primary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of hyaluronic acid - Emervel® Volume Lidocaine combined or not with Emervel® Touchand Emervel® Deep Lidocaine combined or not with Emervel® Touch in subjects with with loss of fatty tissue
primary_outcome.time_frame: at baseline and up to 180 days
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of efficacy of hyaluronic acid - Emervel® Volume Lidocaine combined or not with Emervel® Touch (Galderma) and Emervel® Deep Lidocaine combined or not with Emervel® Touch (Galderma) in female patients with loss of fatty tissue as a sign of aging on hands by Global Aesthetic Improvement scale1 and Hand Grading Scale2.

clinical_study.condition: Injuries to the Wrist and Hand

arm_group.description: The intervention will be the injection of Emervel® Volume Lidocaine alone in the dorsa of one hand and Emervel® Deep Lidocaine alone in the dorsa of the contralateral hand.
EThe intervention will be the injection of mervel® Volume Lidocaine plus Emervel® Touch in the dorsa of one hand and Emervel® Deep Lidocaine plus Emervel® Touch in the dorsa of the contralateral hand

intervention.description: Emervel® Touch will be injected only in the intervention group.

intervention.intervention_name: Emervel® Volume Lidocaine and Emervel® Deep Lidocaine
intervention.description: Emervel® Volume Lidocaine and Emervel® Deep Lidocaine will be injected in the group #2.

overall_official.affiliation: BRAZILIAN CENTER FOR STUDIES IN DERMATOLOGY

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Brazilan Center for Studies in Dermatology
